org.pikater.web.config

Class ServerConfigurationInterfaceOld

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.web.config.ServerConfigurationInterfaceOld

  • public class ServerConfigurationInterfaceOld
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper class for all getters/setters of any server variables.
